document_data.mainbody:
Princes of the Apocalypse is a 2015 Forgotten Realms adventure module for the 5th edition of Dungeons & Dragons, designed by Sasquatch Game Studio. The module was part of the Elemental Evil storyline, and revolved around stopping four destructive cults devoted to the Elder Elemental Eye.
 • Baragustas Harbuckler • Bastian Thermandar • Bertram Nettlebee • Braelen Hatherhand • Bronzefume • Broog-Norb • Bruldenthar • Cavil Zaltobar • Darreth • Dirana • Drexa • Dreyon • Drosnin • Droth • Eardon • Elak Dornen • Eldras Tantur • Elizar Dryflagon • Endrith Vallivoe • Erione • Erned Stoutblade • Eyon • Feng Ironhead • Flameran Verminbane • Gariena •  • Gervor • Ghileeda • Grendo • Grund • Haayon • Haeleeya Hanadroum • Haeler Thommadur • Halinaxus • Heldorm • Hellenrae • Holger •  • Iraun Thelder • Jolliver Grimjaw • Jurth • Justran Daehl • Kaz Hanar • Keltar • Kendrin Feldarr • Larrakh • Lytin • Lyzandra Calderos • Mangobarl Lorren •  • Minthra Mhandyvver • Miraj Vizann • Morbeoth • Nartham • Nerise Gladham •  • Orna • Phaendra Chansyrl • Pike (halfling) • Qarbo • Reetha • Rukhelmoth Glitterstone • Rhundorth • Sauruki • Savra Belabranta Shoalar Quanderil • Stannor Thistlehair • Teresiel • Thuluna Maah • Thurl Merosska • Ulhro Luruth •  • Wiggan Nettlebee • Windharrow • Wulgreda • Yalantha Dreen • Yarsha
